thread.title: In UK: "Kill the Jews" | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: In UK: "Kill the Jews" | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: In UK: "Kill the Jews" | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
Hat tip Jihad Watch
Jew hatred is back in Europe at a level not seen since the 1930s and 40s. Yet, incredibly enough, even in the age of Islamic terror, Western countries (including the US) are rushing pell-mell to import millions of “refugees” from countries with a proven track record of terror and anti-Semitism. The results could hardly be unexpected.
Jihad Watch has the latest from the UK.
http://www.jihadwatch.org/2015/10/uk-we-need-to-kill-all-the-jews
I wonder what Britain’s “fair share” of refugees will amount to.
